mapper.sql: id, tool_type, material_type_id, code, asset_code, serial_no, name, model, supplier_id, entrace_date, lifetime, leave_factory, expir_date, entry_date, line_id, workshop_id, group_id, user_id, warehouse_id, status, service_interval, last_check_time, next_check_time, remark, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, is_self_check, last_self_check_time, price, sync, is_electric, is_fixed_asset, storage_location, company_id
mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.name AS warehouseName, t3.group_name AS groupName, t4.name AS supplierName, NVL(t5.amount, 0) as amount FROM bu_material_tools t1 LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_warehouse t2 ON t2.id = t1.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN bu_mtr_workshop_group t3 ON t3.id = t1.group_id LEFT JOIN bu_base_supplier t4 ON t4.id = t1.supplier_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT material_type_id, COUNT(amount) AS amount FROM bu_material_stock GROUP BY material_type_id) t5 ON t5.material_type_id = t1.material_type_id WHERE t1.id = #{id}
